name: pilfer (itch)
description:
Pilfer is an open-world stealth game in which the player can explore a small village in which they can break into houses and steal from people.

Controls
WASD - move
E - interact

Features
a small town to explore
12 unique items to collect
lockpickingvillagers with their own schedules
online highscores to see who's the best thief in town
